ygData.subject: Re: The Bot in Charge
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine hears the messages and can t help but laugh Oh I m sure if anything happens while we re gone the mighty Shadow Wing can handle it, just imagine

Lunarpine hears the messages and can't help but laugh "Oh I'm sure if 
anything happens while we're gone the mighty Shadow Wing can handle 
it, just imagine they're me returning from a battle all beat up 
again, treat them like you'd treat me."

He knew that one day Wing would learn to control her emotions enough 
to use them on the battlefield, and he'd smile at her as she held the 
head of the sparkless Pred in her talons.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Spears/Shadow Wing::
> 
> Spears::
> "You two get back here ASAP OK? if there is an attack, we will need 
> all the help we can get." She walked down and started welding the 
> sides of the hull.
> 
> Shadow Wing:;
> "Take care you too. Lunar, if anything happens to you this time, 
your 
> wolf tail is mine, got it?" she said with a slight chuckle as she 
> said it. 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Lunarpine grinned,"Alright, I'll sign us out a pod and we can be 
on 
> > our way." The wolfbot had mixxed emotions about the new bot but 
> > decided he'd do anything to get away from the monotany of repair 
> > duty. 
> > 
> > He found a pod, activated its start up procedure, logged in that 
> the 
> > two bots were taking it.
> > "Ok RebelYell we're all set come aboard and we'll be off."
> > 
> > He opened a comm to Shadow Wing and Spears "Take good care of the 
> > place you two." he wanted to invite Shadow Wing along but the 
> thought 
> > wasn't practicle. Rebelyell and Lunarpine could handle the pod.
> >
